citation: Major Infrastructure Development Approvals (North West Transmission Upgrades Project) Amendment Order 2023 (Tas)
text:
Major Infrastructure Development Approvals (North West Transmission Upgrades Project) Amendment Order 2023

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council and in accordance with the recommendation of the Minister, make the following order under section 19(3) of the Major Infrastructure Development Approvals Act 1999 .

7 August 2023

B. BAKER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

MICHAEL DARREL JOSEPH FERGUSON

Minister for Planning

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Major Infrastructure Development Approvals (North West Transmission Upgrades Project) Amendment Order 2023 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Interpretation
    In this order â€“
        Act means the Major Infrastructure Development Approvals Act 1999 .

4. Principal Order
    In this order, the Major Infrastructure Development Approvals (North West Transmission Upgrades Project) Order 2020 is referred to as the Principal Order.

5.
    The amendment effected by this clause has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Major Infrastructure Development Approvals (North West Transmission Upgrades Project) Order 2020 .

6. Determination regarding alteration of order
    The Minister has determined that this order will not alter the Major Infrastructure Development Approvals (North West Transmission Upgrades Project) Order 2020 made by the Governor under section 7(2) of the Act to such an extent or to such effect that this order should be submitted to Parliament for its approval.

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 16 August 2023

This order is administered in the Department of Premier and Cabinet.
